title: Ep 58 | Jase's Greatest Treasure Hunting Find and Which 'Curse Words' Are OK
description:
Jase shows all the things he’s found treasure hunting and talks about the greatest treasure a man can find. Phil shares the story of baptizing his great-granddaughter, and the guys give their thoughts on cursing when you're living a Christian life. They also explain which curse words aren't really curse words at all.

https://PrepareWithPhil.com
